name: Rain (itch) (pont134)
description:
Rain is a quick project thrown together for the 168th One Hour Game Jam on July 14th, 2018. The theme was 'Rain', hence the title! (Creative, I know!)

You control a ball of flame and must avoid the rain drops from the clouds above at all costs - you have a limited number of hits you can sustain before you sizzle out.

The clouds will become increasingly faster and faster until you are extinguished. Try and see how high of a score you can achieve.

Controls:

'A' or 'Left Arrow' to move Left,

'D' or 'Right Arrow' to move Right,

'R' to restart the game.
